main event: Two low flying cigar-shaped objects were sighted over the Loftabad border area in Iran.
interesting points: The objects came from the direction of Russia-Afghanistan, One object flew over the border and returned to Iran while the other continued northward, The objects remained intact for 3 hours before gradually expanding in a contrail pattern, The border commander reported that the objects were wingless and had no visible pilots, The report lacks sufficient data for proper evaluation including duration and corroborating witnesses.
